# docs/frontend/

Manually written Sphinx documentation for the React frontend (`web/`).

| File | Covers |
|---|---|
| `index.rst` | Dev setup, build commands |
| `pages.rst` | Page components: CameraFeeds, Tagging, Processing, FileManager |
| `components.rst` | Shared components: Layout, Toast |
| `utils.rst` | Config constants and shared TypeScript types |
